description: This file defines the MarketProvider class, a ChangeNotifier-based state management class for handling stock market data, alerts, and integrations with a mock Yahoo Finance service within a Flutter application.

classes.name: MarketProvider
classes.description: A provider class that manages stock market data and alerts, fetches data from Yahoo Finance, and notifies listeners on changes.

methods.name: _loadInitial
methods.description: Preloads initial stock data for dashboard display, sorting by absolute change percentage.

methods.name: refresh
methods.description: Refreshes stock data for current top movers and updates alerts.

methods.name: askAI
methods.description: Simulates an AI query interface for a specific stock symbol.

methods.name: peers
methods.description: Returns a list of peer stocks based on the current top movers list, excluding the selected symbol.
